== Burn U-Boot ==
{{{
MV88DE3100|> spinit; erase f0000000 f00fffff; tftpboot 0xf0000000 $PATH_TO_UBOOT
}}}
*NOTE!* Step above is legacy. Refer to Yongsen's trac.<br>
http://10.38.54.84/trac/Baseline/wiki/uboot<br>
{{{
spinit; erase f0000000 f00fffff; tftpboot 0xf0000000 uboot/spi_secure_uboot_CPU1200_A.bin
}}}


== Burn Specific Image(s) ==
{{{
cd $(TREE)/MRVL/MV88DE3100_SDK/MV88DE3100_Tools
make help
make u2nandimg u2nandimglst='bootimgs'
}}}
u2nandimglst can be:
block0 bootloader bootimgs kernel boot recovery system cache userdata sysconf<br>
Image is in $(TREE)/MRVL/Release_image/u2nandimg/<br>


== Burn Specific Image(s) ==
img2sd cc/bootloader.subimg b1<br>
img2sd cc/bootimgs.subimg 1<br>
